Posts.Content: I know how you feel with the taxotere pain plus With being made redundant as I am going through the same thing I am currently of sick from work but found out yesterday that we gone into adminastion
Posts.Title: Taxotere pain

Posts.Content: Hi Rebecca Sorry to give you some bad news but The tattoos You get are permanent but mine are small so they look like freckles Which did not help cause when u get on the machine they still marked Me with a pen as they could hardly see them
Posts.Title: Is RADS always like this?

Posts.Content: Hi sascha I was given a gown on my first appointment which Was the planning one I was also told to keep It until I finished treatment which was a week ago Not sure if they advise you on what to use but I got told simple soap And also make sure I use aqueous cream all I say is make sure u do use it Otherwise you end up with dry skin
Posts.Title: Is RADS always like this?

Posts.Content: Hi i am 35 and i am going through chemo at present I am also half way into chemo got my 5th on the 1st feb my operations is also once chemo finished please tell me a bit about surgery has mine also includes my lymph nodes plus my whole breast I did have good news to after my recent scan to say my cancer has shrunk from a 6cm to nearly 2cm also would not mind a bit of information on weather to have the reconstruction done at the same time or to leave it for a little while thanks Sue
Posts.Title: Coping with cancer treatment AND young kids!

Posts.Content: Hi all finished treatment on the end of july and now I'm the same just want to get back to the way my life was before I had this Hopefully going back to work on the 15th oct Going to go back part time as boss does not want me To rush back into work so going to ask about Working for 15hrs for the first month then slowly build it Up to my contracted hrs of 34
Posts.Title: after treatment

Posts.Content: Hi louise I had the same bit mine was 2 weeks ago With the swelling I would call your bcn or go And see your doctor just to be on the safe side Take care for now Sue Xx
Posts.Title: Anyone else had trouble with arm and fingers swelling on and off ...

Posts.Content: Hi babs Sending you wishes for tomorrow i had my mastectomy in may I just finishing my radiotherapy tomorrow but what Sort of advice are you after if you got any questions I would be glad To answer them for you Sue
Posts.Title: feeling a bit low having mastectomy tomorrow

Posts.Content: Hi jan I have sent you a freinds request please could you add me to the group Thanking you Sue
Posts.Title: facebook

Posts.Content: Hi I had my first shot of ac about two weeks ago not due my 2nd one until 21st dec With the first one I had no side effect it takes About 1 hour to get it done They put the saline in first then the ac stuff Which is a red colour also a clear colour after Then they leave the saline to run through they Give you steroids to take home and also anti Sickness tablets all I say with the Anti sickness tablets let and know I did not Need them I still tooked them for 2 days if you Want anymore information then I be happy To give it to you :)
Posts.Title: what to expect with my 1st chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Wendy I am currently on the ac chemo but I started the other way around with the ac chemo it is very mild I had so far a couple of days where I am tired and feeling a bit sick I have 3 more to go then I done with chemo with the taxotere one I had one treatment followed by 5 days of injections but on the second one I had a serve reaction so the dr in the day unit stopped treatment the ac chemo is first they give you a saline followed by 2sickness shots then they may give you the red chemo first this goes in the same thine as saline this roughly goes though in about 15 mins then they give you another clear type this also takes 15 mins then they let the saline finishing to run once it done they give u anti sickness tablets to take let and know I may not feel sick I still take them for 2days and they also give u steroids to take for 2days if u got any more questions or any information I would be pleased to answer and help u out
Posts.Title: AC Chemo followed by Taxotere

Posts.Content: I got my wig from suzi wigs in lakeside they are really helpful in there
Posts.Title: Real hair wig info required

Posts.Content: Hi I had my mx a week ago and been looking At bras I found matalan does some also Debenham has got a range in and at present Has got offers on plus also doing free p&p with the Drains what a breast care nurse told me was That to buy a drawstring wash bag and put it In there hopefully my drAin will be out 2morrow
Posts.Title: Post op Clothing

Posts.Content: I also started chemo first but now after 4 out of 6 treatments they have noticed that my tumour has not got smaller so now they are doing a scan on Tuesday then I go and see the dr on the 31st jan but now they are saying they are going to do the operation but I guess I will have to wait and see what the results from the scan is
Posts.Title: Chemo first then surgery?

Posts.Content: I not tried any of the headgear but I have also lost most of my hair and I now wear hats I do have a wig but tend to wear the hats as I find them more comfortable
Posts.Title: Headwear

Posts.Content: Hi Lucy I also had long hair and was advised To get it cut short i was diagnosed on the 12th oct Currently I having chemo and then surgery and Then it all happened so quick for me as by the beginning of nov I started chemo do You know what type of chemo you are having ? I started on the taxotere but had a reaction to the drugs so now on ac chemo every 3 weeks but with the taxotere most of my hair fell out I would say if you are gonna get a wig to match your hair is to go and buy it now before the hair falls out has I did
Posts.Title: New to all this .....

Posts.Content: I also had a reaction to taxotere on the first one as I was also came over really hot but they thought it was the cold cap but on the second dose I had a bad reaction and ended up having a convulsion first time but would never like to have it again I was also taken of the trail and had 5 lots of ac chemo which was cyclophosphamide and doxorubicin and my body liked this one Sue
Posts.Title: Allergic reaction to tax

Posts.Content: Hi I also had the same as you , i was also told that i am young to have it being 35 and I am also the only one In my family with it. I had my chemo first followed by a wle and Lymph nodes were I had 10 removed but only 2 showed up with cancer but after recovering From my wle due to not enough clear margin The doctor told me he was going to do a mastectomy I am Now on to my 5th week of radiotheraphy with my chemo I was given taxotere but after having one treatment found out I was allergic to it so instead had 5 treatments of ac and also on the tamifoxen for 5 years
Posts.Title: Results today - Invasive ductal breast cancer, ER and stage 2b

Posts.Content: Hi flower Just thought I send you hugs as I to know what You going through i am only 35 and I just finished my chemo Going to the hospital tomorrow to talk about my mx also going get the genes test done but got to wait until 24 th may For that one take care for now sue xxx
Posts.Title: Age 37 shock at breast clinic yesterday. totally dazed and reeling...
